metadata.Title: CVE-2017-20151 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability classified as problematic was found in iText RUPS. This vulnerability affects unknown code of the file src/main/java/com/itextpdf/rups/model/XfaFile.java. The manipulation leads to xml external entity reference. The patch is identified as ac5590925874ef810018a6b60fec216eee54fb32. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-217054 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: libitext-java package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
